p: DPPH screening test showed the good antioxidant effects of all crude extracts and essential oils. Free-radical scavenging activity of total ethanol extracts was quantitatively determined using a DPPH assay. IC 50 value represents the concentration of tested extract, at which the inhibition of test activity reached 50% ( Figure 2). The results were graphed by Microsoft Excel 2016. The IC 50 values of essential oils were too large (3000–6000 μg/ml), which were outside the linear range.
